> --- In neat@yahoogroups.com, "j=
gmath2000" <jgmath2000@> wrote:
> >
> > Hey there,
> > 
> > You are absolut=
ely right, the manual forgot to include the Board library as a dependency a=
nd where to get it:
> > 
> > http://libboard.sourceforge.net/  libBoard is =
used by the python visualizer to create document-ready images of substrates=
 as displayed in http://eplex.cs.ucf.edu/publications/2010/gauci.nc10.html =
.
> > 
> > I created a cmake build system for libboard that the developers =
have adopted into their source tree, so the procedure of building libboard =
is similar to building tinyxmlplus.
> > 
> > I will update the manual and r=
elease a new version of the code with the updated manual and a copy of libb=
oard included in the next few days.
> > 
> >
